title: An Act providing equity within the Judicial Branch

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Cahill of Lynn, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1603) of Daniel Cahill relative to adjusting the salaries of certain judicial branch employees.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
